name: essential
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: Government support will be essential if the project is to succeed.
example.egtrans: 这个项目能否成功，政府的支持至关重要。

example.eg: There is essential work to be done before the building can be re-occupied.
example.egtrans: 这座楼在重新入住前必须进行必要的维修。

example.eg: Water is essential for/to living things.
example.egtrans: 水对于生物来说是必不可少的。

example.eg: It is essential (that) our prices remain competitive.
example.egtrans: 我们保持价格方面的竞争优势是至关重要的。

example.eg: For the experiment to be valid, it is essential to record the data accurately.
example.egtrans: 要保证实验的有效性，就必须精确地记录数据。

name: essential
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a basic thing that you cannot live without
trans_examp.trans_cn: 必需品；不可缺少的东西

example.eg: Because I live in a remote village, I regard my car as an essential.
example.egtrans: 因为我住在一个偏远的村子里，所以我把汽车看作是必需品。

example.eg: When we go on holiday, we only take the bare essentials.
example.egtrans: 我们去度假时，只带一些最基本的必需品。

example.eg: This leaflet will give you the essentials of how to prepare for a hurricane.
example.egtrans: 这本小册子会告诉你飓风到来前如何做好准备的基本知识。
